name: Racoon
description: The $RAC token is an utility and governance token used by the projects Racoon Supply oversees. $RAC is commonly used to play games on Racoon.Bet; an on-chain gaming platform on Juno Network. It is also used as a governance token for the $RAC DAO; the governing entity of the $RAC token. The upcoming utilities of the $RAC token will be affiliated to on-chain Machine Learning, NFT & mathematical applications that the team from Racoon Supply will be releasing in the near future.
